name: SOC 2 Type II
description: Trust Services Criteria - Security, Availability, Confidentiality, Processing Integrity, Privacy

deliverables.title: CC6.1 - Logical Access Security
deliverables.description: Test logical access controls to protect system resources from unauthorized access
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%access control%' OR title LIKE '%authentication%'

deliverables.title: CC6.2 - User Access Registration
deliverables.description: Verify user registration and authorization processes

deliverables.title: CC6.3 - User Access Removal
deliverables.description: Test removal of access rights upon termination or role change

deliverables.title: CC6.6 - Encryption in Transit
deliverables.description: Verify encryption of data in transit over networks
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%SSL%' OR title LIKE '%TLS%' OR title LIKE '%encryption%'

deliverables.title: CC6.7 - Encryption at Rest
deliverables.description: Verify encryption of sensitive data at rest

deliverables.title: CC7.1 - Vulnerability Management
deliverables.description: Test for known vulnerabilities and missing patches
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%CVE%' OR title LIKE '%vulnerability%'

deliverables.title: CC7.2 - Security Monitoring
deliverables.description: Verify security event monitoring and alerting capabilities

deliverables.title: CC7.3 - Incident Response
deliverables.description: Test incident detection and response procedures

deliverables.title: CC8.1 - Change Management
deliverables.description: Verify change management controls for system modifications

deliverables.title: A1.2 - Availability Controls
deliverables.description: Test system availability and disaster recovery capabilities
